alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 7:10PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kemper and northern Lauderdale Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 710 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Daleville, or over Meridian Station, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Daleville around 715 PM CDT. Prismatic around 720 PM CDT. Blackwater around 730 PM CDT. Liberty around 740 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
